CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT(Property_Type__c) = "Apartments", Base_Value__c + PLC_Amount__c + Bescom_STP_and_Generator__c + Floor_Rise_Charge__c + Extra_car_parking_charges__c + Car_Parking__c + amenities_charges__c + Legal_Documentation_Charges__c ,
IF( TEXT(Property_Type__c) = "Villas", Base_Value__c + PLC_Amount__c + Bescom_Charges__c + STP_and_Generator_Charges__c + Extra_Land_Amount__c,
IF( TEXT(Property_Type__c) = "Plots", Base_Value__c + PLC__c + Bescom_STP_and_Generator__c + amenities_charges__c + Legal_Documentation_Charges__c, IF( TEXT(Property_Type__c) = "Row House", Base_Value__c + PLC_Amount__c + Bescom_Charges__c + STP_and_Generator_Charges__c + Legal_Documentation_Charges__c , 0 ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Sub Total
